{"id":218537526,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 years, 8 months","timestamp":1553878959,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"68 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/218537526/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Island Perimeter","memory":"16.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int n,m;\n    int dfs1(vector<vector<int>>& grid,int i,int j){\n        int ans = 0;\n        if(i<0 || j<0 || i>=n || j>=m || grid[i][j] == 0 ){\n            return 1;\n        }\n        else if(grid[i][j] == 1){\n            grid[i][j] =-1;\n            int ans = dfs1(grid,i-1,j) + dfs1(grid,i+1,j) + dfs1(grid,i,j+1) + dfs1(grid,i,j - 1) ;\n            return ans;\n        }\n        else return 0;\n    }\n    \n    int islandPerimeter(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        //FASTIO\n        ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n        cin.tie(NULL);\n        cout.tie(NULL);\n        \n        n = grid.size();\n        m = grid[0].size();\n        int peri = 0;\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<m;j++){\n                if(grid[i][j] == 1){\n                    peri += dfs1(grid,i,j);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return peri;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"island-perimeter"}
